DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study ( ) evaluate whether single measurement VEGF would allow u distinguish intrauterine pregnancy ( normal abnormal ) EP ( ii ) correlate level VEGF serum level progesterone β-hCG subgroup . Ninety patient select population woman present Hospital da Clínicas University São Paulo Medical School October 2006 September 2007 divide three subgroup : ( ) abnormal ( arrest ) intrauterine pregnancy ( defined gestational sac great 16 mm mean diameter without fetal tissue embryo great 5 mm without embryo cardiac activity ) ; ( ii ) tubal pregnancy ( evidence intrauterine pregnancy , presence adnexal mass , suboptimal rise serum hCG level 48 hour ) ; tubal pregnancy surgically treat histologically confirm , receive methotrexate treatment operation ; ( iii ) normal intrauterine pregnancy ( intrauterine gestational sac , embryo vitality confirm ) . Blood sample collect peripheral venous puncture treatment ; total 15 mL blood withdrawn ( 2 mL β-hCG , 3mL progesterone , 10 mL VEGF determination ) . Blood sample VEGF collect siliconized tube allow coagulate room temperature 2-6 hour .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : woman positive hCG test present either abdominal pain vaginal bleeding ; pregnancy singleton , spontaneously conceive , accurate assessment gestational age ( 42 56 day first day last menstrual period ) . A detailed informed consent obtain patient inclusion . Exclusion Criteria : nonampullar tubal pregnancy ( surgically confirm ) .
